sentences.english: She has been victimized by his adultery, although she had no part in it.
sentences.chinese: 儘管她與此無關，她卻成了他所犯的姦淫罪的受害者。

sentences.english: You are to abstain from food sacrificed to idols, from blood, from the meat of strangled animals and from sexual immorality.
sentences.chinese: 就是禁戒祭偶像的物，和血，並勒死的牲畜，和姦淫。

sentences.english: The Vikings raped and pillaged all along the coast.
sentences.chinese: 北歐海盜沿着海岸大肆姦淫劫掠。

sentences.english: Even if you do not commit adultery but kill, you have become a transgressor of the law.
sentences.chinese: 縱然你不行姦淫，你卻殺人，你仍成了犯法的人。

sentences.english: Neither repented they of their murders, nor of their sorceries, nor of their fornication, nor of their thefts.
sentences.chinese: 又不悔改他們那些兇殺，邪術，姦淫，偷竊的事。

sentences.english: 29You are to abstain from food sacrificed to idols, from blood, from the meat of strangled animals and from sexual immorality.
sentences.chinese: 就是禁戒祭偶像的物，和血，並勒死的牲畜，和姦淫。

sentences.english: Now if you do not commit adultery, but you murder, you have become a transgressor of the law.
sentences.chinese: 你若是不姦淫，卻殺人，還是成了犯律法的。

sentences.english: for they be all adulterers, an assembly of treacherous men.
sentences.chinese: 因他們都是行姦淫的，是行詭詐的一黨。

sentences.english: Whoredom and wine and new wine take away the heart.
sentences.chinese: 姦淫和酒，並新酒，奪去人的心。

definition: not to shrink from any crime (idiom); to commit any imaginable misdeed
lit. not an inch of steel (idiom); unarmed and defenseless
to be devoid of all humanity/inhuman/bestial
to kill sb for his property (idiom); to murder for money
strict law/cruel punishment/to carry out cruel law rigorously
